segments.text: Here. I need to borrow some moisturizer.
segments.speaker: Joey

segments.text: For what?
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: Whaddya think? Today's the big day!
segments.speaker: Joey

segments.text: Oh my God. Okay, go into the bathroom, use whatever you want, just don't ever tell me what you did in there.
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: Thank you!
segments.speaker: Joey

segments.text: Where's Joey? His mom's on the phone.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: He's in the bathroom. I don't think you wanna go in there!
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: C'mon, we're roommates!  My eyes!! My eyes!!
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: I warned you...
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: Who is being loud?
segments.speaker: Rachel

segments.text: Oh, that would be Monica.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Hey, listen, I wanna borrow a coupla things, Aurora spent the night, I really wanna make her breakfast.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Oh, you got the whole night, huh?
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: Yeah, well, I only have twenty minutes until Ethan, so, y'know..
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Ooh, do I sense a little bit of resentment?
segments.speaker: Rachel

segments.text: No, no resentment, believe me, it's worth it.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: 'Kay?
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Y'know in a relationship you have these key moments that you know you'll remember for the rest of your life?
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Well, every- single- second is like that with Aurora.. and I've just wasted about thirty-five of them talking to you people, so, uh.. Monica, can you help me with the door?
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Oh, um, Chandler?
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: Y'know, the-the old Monica would-would remind you to scrub that Teflon pan with a plastic brush...But I'm not gonna do that.
segments.speaker: Monica
